评论概述: When they say pre-worn, they mean pre-worn.
评论详情: Item arrived in a wrinkled ball. The fabric is quite worn and it's a chino-like fabric that has no water-repellant quality to it whatsoever. It's also not lined as described in the listing. This is a huge disappointment from RTR.
I imagine this fabric is used for prison clothing. It also had a very chemical smell. I was very disappointed.
